Text.Page: The argons just don't let up. We need a better way to hold them off than throwing bodies at them.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Can I help?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Absolutely. My friend, {@LinkCreature:248#3014#Damian}, at the {@Rgn:48004$$Cyanocannon Foundry} is at the end of his rope.

If you can help the foundry folks out, that'd make life easier for everyone.
Yes, we need help! We're low on supplies, and with the gate sealed it's tough to find raw materials.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What can I do?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

There's a lot of scrap, both ours and theirs, we can salvage. Gather components scattered around the {@Rgn:48001$$Khanovar Front}.

The more we can repurpose, the less time it takes to get our weapons into the field.

Finally! Some capable help!

With these, we'll kick the argons right in the daddy-bags!

Do argons even have daddy-bags?
Argon components are a key component to cyanocannons. I'd love to get my hands on some.

Finally! Some capable help!

With these, we'll kick the argons right in the daddy-bags!

Do argons even have daddy-bags?

We really need some siege weapon components. Those things can do some damage. We need that kind of power.

Good luck out there.
